name: SKAttributeValue
desc: A container for dynamic shader data associated with a node.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new attribute value object

items.name: init(float: Float)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new attribute value object that holds a floating point number.

items.name: init(vectorFloat2: vector_float2)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new attribute value object that holds a vector of two floating point numbers.

items.name: init(vectorFloat3: vector_float3)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new attribute value object that holds a vector of three floating point numbers.

items.name: init(vectorFloat4: vector_float4)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new attribute value object that holds a vector of four floating point numbers.

items.name: var vectorFloat2Value: vector_float2
items.desc: The receiver’s value as a vector of two floating-point numbers.

items.name: var vectorFloat3Value: vector_float3
items.desc: The receiver’s value as a vector of three floating point numbers.

items.name: var vectorFloat4Value: vector_float4
items.desc: The receiver’s value as a vector of four floating point numbers.
